channel.title: Help with a hp problem on testscape
channel.description:
Well i have a server that is built off of Testscape right...............I have max stats set to 200 higest allowed...........but when i go in game put master cheat in i have 200/99 right.....but when i put armor on then get hit it lowers to 80/99.....then when i eat it wont go up......any help?
TY
~Owner Soulx~[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 11:22:50 AM[/size][hr]cmon help

item.title: Help with a hp problem on testscape

didn’t work still same prob

item.title: Help with a hp problem on testscape
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

go player.java and then search for for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
u will see if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 13500000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

change the 99to 200 and the exp to the exp of lvl 200

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a hp problem on testscape
